title: Opinion: Siddhartha Mukherjee: Metabolism is the next frontier in cancer treatment
description: Siddhartha Mukherjee, oncologist and author of “The Emperor of All Maladies,” asks: What if we change what a tumor can eat?
content: Siddhartha Mukherjee, oncologist and author of “The Emperor of All Maladies,” asks: What if we change what a tumor can eat?
